title: Touchpoints
description: Charlotte was a thriving Silicon Valley entrepreneur until a series of tragic events knocked her off her mental game. She heads to Prince Edward Island for the summer, with a plan to reboot her career and her sex life.She hooks up with a local; the sex is incredible and she’s insatiable. He falls hard, and realizes he’s going to need all his skills and savvy to keep the dynamic Charlotte in his life.Unrequited love, expectations from family and community, and the demands of tech startup life create challenges, and Charlotte needs to head back to Silicon Valley…Available on Amazon, paperback or Kindle.
author: Brienne Loughlin
